[level] level = 1 name = Level 1 flags = CiBhaPzIW1 greeting = Level 1 [n] ^7just connected greeting_sound =
[level] level = 2 name = Level2 flags = CiBhaPzIW1mx greeting = Level 2 [n] ^7just connected greeting_sound =
[level] level = 3 name = Level 3 flags = CiBhaPzIW1mxpZSAURKrwlLdX259 greeting = Level 3 [n] ^7just connected greeting_sound =

tc_custom_variables.name: StopwatchCycle

set m2r1 "g_gametype 3; map oasis; set nextmap vstr m2r2; sets StopwatchRound 1;" set m2r2 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r3; sets StopwatchRound 2;" set m2r3 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r4; sets StopwatchRound 3;" set m2r4 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r5; sets StopwatchRound 4;"
set m2r5 "g_gametype 3; map battery; set nextmap vstr m2r6; sets StopwatchRound 1;" set m2r6 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r7; sets StopwatchRound 2;" set m2r7 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r8; sets StopwatchRound 3;" set m2r8 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r9; sets StopwatchRound 4;"
set m2r9 "g_gametype 3; map goldrush; set nextmap vstr m2r10; sets StopwatchRound 1;" set m2r10 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r11; sets StopwatchRound 2;" set m2r11 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r12; sets StopwatchRound 3;" set m2r12 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r13; sets StopwatchRound 4;"
set m2r13 "g_gametype 3; map radar; set nextmap vstr m2r14; sets StopwatchRound 1;" set m2r14 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r15; sets StopwatchRound 2;" set m2r15 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r16; sets StopwatchRound 3;" set m2r16 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r17; sets StopwatchRound 4;"
set m2r17 "g_gametype 3; map railgun; set nextmap vstr m2r18; sets StopwatchRound 1;" set m2r18 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r19; sets StopwatchRound 2;" set m2r19 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r20; sets StopwatchRound 3;" set m2r20 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r21; sets StopwatchRound 4;"
set m2r21 "g_gametype 3; map fueldump; set nextmap vstr m2r22; sets StopwatchRound 1;" set m2r22 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r23; sets StopwatchRound 2;" set m2r23 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r24; sets StopwatchRound 3;" set m2r24 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r1; sets StopwatchRound 4;"

tc_game_scripts.description: Delete etconsole.log before starting the service (Windows)
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
IF NOT EXIST etmain\etconsole.log GOTO END
del /q etmain\etconsole.log
:END
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-06-11 04:15:42" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2011-07-15 04:02:37" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: #!/bin/bash if [ ! -d "etpub" ] ; then mkdir etpub fi mv -f __tmp/linux/qagame.mp.i386.so etpub/ rm -fr __tmp

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: IF EXIST etpub GOTO CONTINUE mkdir etpub :CONTINUE move /y __tmp\win32\qagame_mp_x86.dll etpub\ rd /s /q __tmp

tc_game_mods.comments:
ET Pro is a mod specifically targeted at competition play, with features specifically designed for administration of competition servers.
ET Pro has been chosen as the official tournament mod for STA, TWL, CAL, Clanbase, and ESL.
tc_game_mods.cmdline: +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip "$[Service.IpAddress]" +set net_port "$[Service.GamePort]" +set sv_maxclients "$[Service.Slots]" +set fs_game etpro +exec "server.cfg" +exec "etpro.cfg"
tc_game_mods.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-02-04 18:09:25" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2013-02-23 22:18:01" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:UNIQUE_ID" value="86a908f9-9f12-49f3-8dd3-23bbd9da5b8e" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_mods.comments: ETPub was to expand on the concepts of Shrubet. It kept some of the features of Shrubet such as "playing dead" and "corpse dragging" but also added newer features and bug fixes. It is now a popular mod in the newer version of Enemy Territory along with ETpro and Jaymod.
tc_game_mods.cmdline: +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip "$[Service.IpAddress]" +set net_port "$[Service.GamePort]" +set sv_maxclients "$[Service.Slots]" +set fs_game etpub +exec "server.cfg" +exec "etpub.cfg"

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Template" value="^[\s]*set[\s]+d(?<ItemId>[0-9]+)[\s]+"[\s]*campaign[\s]+(?<CampaignName>[\w]+)[\s]+;[\s]+set[\s]+nextcampaign[\s]+vstr[\s]+d(?<NextItemId>[0-9]+)[\s]*"[\s]*" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ItemsSeparatedByNewLine" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="AllowNew" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="NewText" value="New Campaign" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="NewTemplate" value="set d1 "campaign cmpgn_northafrica ; set nextcampaign vstr d2"" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="AllowDelete" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="DeleteText" value="Delete" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="StartIndex" value="1" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="MinItems" value="2" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxItems" value="0" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Template" value="^[\s]*set[\s]+m2r(?<RealItemId>[\d]+)[\s]*"[\s]*g_gametype[\s]*3[\s]*;[\s]*map[\s]*(?<Map>[\w]+)[\s]*;[\s]*set[\s]*nextmap[\s]*vstr[\s]*m2r(?<NextRealItemId>[\d]+)[\s]*;[\s]*sets[\s]*StopwatchRound[\s]*1[\s]*;[\s]*"[\s]*(?<AdditionalRounds>([\s]*set[\s]*m2r([\d]+)[\s]*"[\s]*map_restart[\s]*([\d]+)[\s]*;[\s]*set[\s]*nextmap[\s]*vstr[\s]*m2r([\d]+)[\s]*;[\s]*sets[\s]*StopwatchRound[\s]*([\d]+)[\s]*;[\s]*"[\s]*)*)" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ItemsSeparatedByNewLine" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="AllowNew" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="NewText" value="New Rotation" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="NewTemplate" value="set m2r1 "g_gametype 3; map oasis; set nextmap vstr m2r2; sets StopwatchRound 1;" 
set m2r2 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r3; sets StopwatchRound 2;" 
set m2r3 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r4; sets StopwatchRound 3;"
set m2r4 "map_restart 0; set nextmap vstr m2r5; sets StopwatchRound 4;"" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="AllowDelete" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="DeleteText" value="Delete Rotation" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="StartIndex" value="1" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="MinItems" value="1" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxItems" value="0" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> </values>
